info.title: Expander
info.description: Builds an Expander object. It consists of a head and a body part. The body's view can be toggled by clicking on the head

prop.name: head
prop.description: The head part of the expander

prop.name: body
prop.description: The body part of the expander

method.name: __construct
method.description: Constructor Method. Initializes the expander object

method.name: build
method.description: Builds the expander's structure and returns the object for further manipulation.

method.name: appendToHead
method.description: Appends content to the head of the expander and returns the object for further manipulation

parameter.name: $element
parameter.description: The content to be appended to the expander's head.

method.name: appendToBody
method.description: Appends content to the body of the expander and returns the object for further manipulation

parameter.name: $element
parameter.description: The content to be appended to the expander's body.

method.name: append_to_head
method.description: Appends content to the head of the expander

parameter.name: $element
parameter.description: The content to be appended to the expander's head.

method.name: append_to_body
method.description: Appends content to the body of the expander

parameter.name: $element
parameter.description: The content to be appended to the expander's body.
